page.title: 02SIXHILLS _ SUMMARY
page.content: Hamlet on edge of Wolds _ fine views incl: Lincoln Cathedral 20 miles. Reached by very minor roads _ commun_ _ity of 36 adults & 9 children. 18 houses incl: 5 tied farm cotts. and 2 Council houses. Farmhouse and Vicarage date from 1700, rest Victorian and 2 post WWII. 12 houses have car and 11 on 'phone _ also public kiosk. One bus weekly to Louth. Mains water & Electr_ _icity: sewerage by Septic Tank: Police cover from Mkt Rasen. Doctors at Wragby & Mkt Rasen: Library Van visits. School bus _ Primary to Mkt. Rasen & Donnington on Bain _ Secondary to Rasen & Louth.Post by van daily but P.0.at Hainton,2m.Refuse collection wkly. Milkman & Baker twice and Butch_ er once wkly.Evening & Sunday papers only delivered. Occupations_ 8 on land Int.Design Decorator, Civil Eng.Welder on Oil Rigs & 3 OAP families.
